channel.title: +1 Forward - Lessons Learned in 2022 and Finale!
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/final-episode-lessons-learned-in-2022
It's a super-sized episode as Rach and Rich talk about the lessons they learned playing and running PbtA games in 2022, and we bring the podcast to a close.
Timecodes: 0:01:23 - Read a Sitch about 2022 gaming highlights 0:35:14 - Open Your Brain to our stray thoughts about PbtA games and play 0:52:08 - Act Under Fire - our closing thoughts
You can find Rach on Mastodon (it's a social media site - google it!) She's @teddog@dice.camp You can find Rich on Mastodon, too. He's @orklord@dice.camp
Thanks so much to all of our wonderful guests over the years! Thanks to you, our listeners, too. Happy Holiday and Happy New Year!

item.title: +1 Forward - Lessons Learned in 2022 and Finale!
item.dc:creator: @RichRogers
item.description:
@RichRogers wrote:

THE GAUNTLET

Final Episode - Lessons Learned in 2022

iTunes:  https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/+1-forward/id1110623840 RSS:  http://1forward.libsyn.com/rss

It’s a super-sized episode as Rach and Rich talk about the lessons they learned playing and running PbtA games in 2022, and we bring the podcast to a close.

Timecodes:
0:01:23 - Read a Sitch about 2022 gaming highlights
0:35:14 - Open Your Brain to our stray thoughts about PbtA games and play
0:52:08 - Act Under Fire - our closing thoughts

You can find Rach on Mastodon (it’s a social media site - google it!) She’s @teddog@dice.camp
You can find Rich on Mastodon, too. He’s @orklord@dice.camp

Thanks so much to all of our wonderful guests over the years! Thanks to you, our listeners, too. Happy Holiday and Happy New Year!
